map.starter_town.name: Havenbrook
map.starter_town.description: A bustling small town surrounded by verdant forests and a winding river. The town is known for its friendly inhabitants and acts as a starting point for many adventurers.
map.starter_town.rooms.tavern.name: The Drunken Dragon
map.starter_town.rooms.tavern.descriptio: The smell of roasted meat and the sound of lively music welcome you into the warm embrace of the town's favorite gathering spot.
map.starter_town.rooms.town_square.name: Town Square
map.starter_town.rooms.town_square.descr: The open area in the center of town is bustling with merchants, travelers, and townsfolk going about their daily business.
map.starter_town.rooms.market.name: Marketplace
map.starter_town.rooms.market.descriptio: Stalls with colorful awnings display an array of goods from exotic spices to fine silks.
shop.general_store.name: Baldric's Goods
shop.general_store.description: A general store stocked with a variety of essentials for travelers and locals alike.
map.starter_town.rooms.smithy.name: Blacksmith's Forge
map.starter_town.rooms.smithy.descriptio: The steady rhythm of a hammer striking anvil rings out from this forge where weapons and armor are made.
shop.blacksmith.name: Ironhand Smithy
shop.blacksmith.description: Run by the dwarf Tordek Ironhand, this smithy crafts some of the finest arms and armor in the region.
map.starter_town.rooms.main_gate.name: Main Gate
map.starter_town.rooms.main_gate.descrip: The towering gate serves as the primary entrance and exit for the town, with guards monitoring the comings and goings.
map.starter_town.rooms.temple.name: Temple of the Divines
map.starter_town.rooms.temple.descriptio: Stained glass windows and the scent of incense signify this place of worship and peace.
shop.potion_shop.name: Elixirs & Essences
shop.potion_shop.description: An assortment of bottles and concoctions line the shelves, tended by the cleric Althea.
item.healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
item.healing_potion.visual: a small red vial with a glowing liquid
item.healing_potion.description: A potion that heals minor wounds.
item.mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
item.mana_potion.visual: a small blue vial with a shimmering liquid
item.mana_potion.description: A potion that restores a small amount of magical energy.
item.antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
item.antitoxin.visual: a greenish flask sealed with wax
item.antitoxin.description: A liquid solution that provides resistance to poisons.
item.rope.name: Rope
item.rope.visual: a coil of sturdy hemp rope
item.rope.description: A 50-foot length of rope useful for climbing or binding.
item.torch.name: Torch
item.torch.visual: a wooden stick wrapped at one end with a cloth soaked in pitch
item.torch.description: Provides light in dark places when lit.
weapon.short_sword.name: Short Sword
weapon.short_sword.visual: a sturdy blade with a leather-wrapped hilt
weapon.short_sword.description: A versatile weapon favored by many adventurers.
weapon.wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
weapon.wooden_shield.visual: a round shield made from sturdy oak
weapon.dagger.name: Dagger
weapon.dagger.visual: a small but sharp blade with an ornate handle
weapon.dagger.description: A quick and lethal weapon for close combat.
